short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browsing experience with PineappleTab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with **PineappleTab**, a versatile Chrome extension that transforms your new tab into a personalized dashboard. Access your favorite websites, bookmarks, and essential tools seamlessly, all from one place.

**Key Features:**

- **Customizable Interface:** Tailor your new tab with widgets, stunning backgrounds, and quick links to frequently visited sites.
- **Integrated Search:** Utilize a unified search bar that combines results from multiple search engines for comprehensive information retrieval.
- **Productivity Tools:** Manage tasks, take notes, and stay organized with built-in utilities designed to boost efficiency.
- **Privacy-Focused:** PineappleTab respects your privacy, ensuring that your data remains secure and is not shared with third parties.

By installing PineappleTab, you agree to set your new tab and default search to Yahoo Search, as outlined in our [Terms of Service](https://www.pineappletab.com/terms.html) and [Privacy Policy](https://www.pineappletab.com/privacy.html).

Elevate your browsing with PineappleTabâ€”where functionality meets personalization. 

Search powered by Yahoo Search
